### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title
F521A-230102: CCG Seal Cove Helipad Replacement

#### Contract Reference Number
WS3912647591-Doc3993070354

#### Publication Date
June 23, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
July 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

#### Duration
The project will start on July 31, 2023, and is expected to be completed by October 31, 2023

#### Description of the Project
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services] ([PSPC]) has posted a tender to replace the existing helipad at Seal Cove. The contract involves the following key aspects:

* Excavation and removal of the existing concrete surface, base, and subbase materials
* Removal and disposal of organic matter
* Supply and placement of thick granular subbase over the subgrade
* Supply and placement of thick granular base layer and hot asphalt
* Supply and installation of cast-in-placement concrete and high chain-link fence
* Supply and installation of electrical services

#### Optional Work
The following optional work is also included in the tender:

* Supply and placement of cast-in-place concrete, including rebar, and paint lines

#### Contracting Entity
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services] ([PSPC]) is the contracting entity for this project, and their address is as follows:

11 Laurier St, Phase III,
Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information
For more information on the tender, please contact:

* Tian (Lam) at [tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL
You can obtain more information on the tender through the following URL:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16675837

#### Tender Process
This tender is a result of the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)], with the view to a competitive tender process, and the project will be awarded based on the lowest price.
